Description.description: A repo lists papers related to LLM based agent. Includes

Recommendation.description: For more comprehensive reading, we also recommend other paper lists:

items.name: zjunlp/LLMAgentPapers
items.description: Must-read Papers on Large Language Model Agents.

items.name: teacherpeterpan/self-correction-llm-papers
items.description: This is a collection of research papers for Self-Correcting Large Language Models with Automated Feedback.

items.description: A Survey on LLM-based Autonomous Agents.

items.name: git-disl/awesome-LLM-game-agent-papers
items.description: Must-read papers for LLM-based Game agents.
